query:
SELECT id, name, slug, `order`, 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pages WHERE moduleId = m.id) as total_pages
FROM modules m 
WHERE disciplineId = 1 
ORDER BY `order`
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3791tceNk2iYTis.4402e8216d86 --database T5Ee3HJGcPdFeU4iAe9r9p --execute SELECT id, name, slug, `order`, 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pages WHERE moduleId = m.id) as total_pages
FROM modules m 
WHERE disciplineId = 1 
ORDER BY `order`
